Class LinkedBinaryTree<E>

    E - general param
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BinaryTree<E>, BinaryTreeCollection<E>, Tree<E>, java.lang.Iterable<E>
    public class LinkedBinaryTree<E>
extends AbstractBinaryTree<E>
    linked binary tree, a binary tree with a linked list in the background

    sanjana cheerla
